p.k: Florist Carlo Gambardella (Giampaolo Morelli) and biologist Valentina Trevisol (Gaia Bermani Amaral) meet one day by chance and their lives change forever. He is the single father of five children, struggling every day with his cumbersome family. In contrast, Valentina’s life is much quieter. She’s the daughter of a harsh magistrate engaged in a trial against a mafia boss.
